attributes.action: Hold a full public and independent inquiry  into the war in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the secret inquiry by Gordon Brown MP. We want the truth to come out. The people don't want a clutch hand picked grandees; to cover up why this Government brought Islamic terror, to our shores for the first time in British history. We want to know why our brave men and women are dying and why they were sent to foreign fields. We want the whole truth and nothing but the truth.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
